billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Increases the minimum amount of time served of an indeterminate sentence to 85% of the maximum term; repealer
summary: Increases the minimum amount of time which must be served upon the imposition of an indeterminate sentence of imprisonment to 85% of the maximum term.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the penal law, in relation to the minimum amount of time served of an indeterminate sentence and repealing certain provisions of the correction law and the executive law relating thereto
